pages.text: In order to make the anvil process smoother, this mod has completed some of the features that the vanilla should have.

pages.name: Completion of Cauldrons
pages.text: Complete the missing cauldron layers in the vanilla.

pages.name: Dispensers Operate Cauldrons
pages.text: The dispenser uses water bottles, empty bottles, lava buckets, powder snow buckets, water buckets and empty buckets to interact with the cauldron.
Dispensers Interact with Mobs:$(br)The dispenser can use iron ingots to repair iron golem, and can use buckets to interact with cow to receive milk.
